00042 QString CToolClass::locatehtml(const QString &filename) {
00043     QString path = locate("html", KGlobal::locale()->language() + '/' + filename);
00044     if (path.isNull())
00045        path = locate("html", "default/" + filename);
00046     if (path.isNull())
00047        path = locate("html", "en/" + filename);
00048     return path;
00049 }
00050 
00052 QString CToolClass::urlToKey(const QString& url) {
00053     if (url.left(8) == "sword://")
00054         return url.mid( 8, url.length()-9 );
00055     return url; 
00056 }
00057 
00059 QString CToolClass::htmlToText(const QString& html) {
00060   QString newText = html;
00061   // convert some tags we need in code
00062     newText.replace( QRegExp(" "),"#SPACE#" );
00063     newText.replace( QRegExp("<BR>\\s*"), "<BR>\n" );
00064     newText.replace( QRegExp("#SPACE#")," " );
00065     return newText; 
00066 }
00067 
00069 QString CToolClass::textToHTML(const QString& text){
00070     QString newText = text;
00071     newText.replace( QRegExp("<BR>\n"),"#NEWLINE#" );
00072     newText.replace( QRegExp("\n"),"<BR>\n" );
00073     newText.replace( QRegExp("#NEWLINE#"),"<BR>\n");    
00074     return newText;
00075 }
00076 
00079 bool CToolClass::savePlainFile( const QString& filename, const QString& text){
00080     QFile saveFile(filename);
00081     bool ret;
00082         
00083     if (saveFile.exists()) {
00084         if (KMessageBox::warningYesNo(0,
00085                 QString::fromLatin1("<qt><B>%1</B><BR>%2</qt>")
00086                     .arg( i18n("The file does already exist!!") )
00087                     .arg( i18n("Do you want to overwrite it?")))
00088                 == KMessageBox::No
00089             )
00090             return false;
00091         else
00092             saveFile.remove();
00093     }
00094     
00095     if ( saveFile.open(IO_ReadWrite) ) {
00096         QTextStream textstream( &saveFile );
00097         textstream << text;
00098         saveFile.close();
00099         ret = true;
00100     }
00101     else {
00102         KMessageBox::error(0, QString::fromLatin1("<qt>%1<BR><B>%2</B></qt>")
00103             .arg( i18n("Sorry! But the file couldn't be saved!") )
00104             .arg( i18n("Please check permissions etc. !")));
00105         saveFile.close();
00106         ret = false;        
00107     }   
00108     return ret;
00109 }

00111 
00113 QPixmap CToolClass::getIconForModule( CSwordModuleInfo* module_info ){
00114   if (!module_info)
00115     return QPixmap(BIBLE_ICON_SMALL);
00116     
00117     switch (module_info->type()){
00118       case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00119         if (module_info->isLocked())
00120           return QPixmap(BIBLE_LOCKED_ICON_SMALL);
00121         else
00122           return QPixmap(BIBLE_ICON_SMALL);
00123       case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00124         if (module_info->isLocked())
00125           return QPixmap(LEXICON_LOCKED_ICON_SMALL);
00126         else
00127           return QPixmap(LEXICON_ICON_SMALL);
00128       case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:
00129         if (module_info->isLocked())
00130           return QPixmap(COMMENTARY_LOCKED_ICON_SMALL);
00131         else
00132           return QPixmap(COMMENTARY_ICON_SMALL);
00133       case CSwordModuleInfo::Unknown:
00134       default:
00135         return QPixmap(BIBLE_ICON_SMALL);
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 int CToolClass::makeLogicFontSize( const int s ) {
00140     const int defSize = QApplication::font().pointSize();
00141   if ( s < defSize - 4 )
00142         return 1;
00143     if ( s < defSize )
00144         return 2;
00145     if ( s < defSize + 4 )
00146         return 3;
00147     if ( s < defSize + 8 )
00148         return 4;
00149     if ( s < defSize + 12 )
00150         return 5;
00151     if (s < defSize + 16 )
00152         return 6;
00153     return 7;
00154 }

00156 QLabel* CToolClass::explanationLabel(QWidget* parent, const QString& heading, const QString& text ){
00157   QLabel* label = new QLabel( QString::fromLatin1("<B>%1</B><BR>%2").arg(heading).arg(text),parent );
00158   label->setAutoResize(true);
00159   label->setMargin(1);
00160   label->setFrameStyle(QFrame::Box | QFrame::Plain);
00161 
00162 //  label->setLineWidth(1);
00163 //  label->setMidLineWidth(1);
00164 
00165   return label;
00166 }
00168 bool CToolClass::inHTMLTag(int pos, QString & text){
00169  int i1=text.findRev("<",pos);
00170  int i2=text.findRev(">",pos);
00171  int i3=text.find(">",pos);
00172  int i4=text.find("<",pos);
00173 
00174 
00175 //  if ((i1>0) && (i2==-1))  //we're in th first html tag
00176 //      i2=i1; // not ncessary, just for explanation
00177 
00178     if ((i3>0) && (i4==-1))  //we're in the last html tag
00179       i4=i3+1;
00180 
00181   qWarning("%d > %d && %d < %d",i1,i2,i3,i4);
00182 
00183  if ( (i1>i2) && (i3<i4) )
00184     return true; //yes, we're in a tag
00185 
00186   return false;
00187 }
